main event: A sighting of a bright object was reported in Herford, Germany, on May 5, 1955, observed for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared bright and high in altitude,It was suggested that the object could be a satellite or possibly a balloon,The observation was made during a clear night,At one point, the object was described as moving in a straight line at high speed,No photographs were taken during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: A private first class in the army.
